file_content.text: I have landed on Corellia.
The ledge is near.
Wrath, you are there to protect Darth Vowrawn from Baras's threats. Our efforts to locate his secret headquarters are ongoing.
Another digit of the Hand will tap the Wrath.
Meanwhile, we are tracking three assassins arriving on secret landing fields. It will be difficult to stop them all.
I can do it.
Then let's keep this short.
Not happy about this..
Transmitting the coordinates for all three landing strips.
Got 'em.
Received, my lord.
These killers are but the first. There will be more.
Vowrawn actively defies Baras. If he dies, Baras will be named the Voice of the Emperor.
Protect Darth Vowrawn at all costs, and aid in his attempts to undermine our enemy. Goodbye.
My lord, our holo is being commandeered....
My lord, I'm detecting a forced transmission....
I assume you still recognize me. Consider yourself fortunate that I am reaching out like this.
My old master. You have some nerve showing your face.
Darth Baras.
I believe you have the market on nerve cornered, my friend.
You do know I'm going to kill you, right?
Hello, dead man.
I am beyond your reach, and therefore beyond concern.
I'm sorry, should I know you?
And you are?
Your wit has not improved.
It must be ignorance driving your actions. As wronged by me as you may feel, surely you are not intentionally defying the Emperor.
I'm here to tell you that you are being deceived. The organization you work for is not the Emperor's Hand.
You're the deceiver, Baras.
Liar.
I don't blame you for doubting me. And I will not apologize for my actions.
Why don't you enlighten me?
Then who are they?
All you need to know is that you are the puppet of a sect that the Emperor cast off. They seek his destruction.
I am his Voice. I don't expect you to trust me, and in the end, you and what you think are inconsequential.
They want you dead, and I want you dead. So it works for me.
I don't care.
Reckless. Your petty personal vendetta overrides your sense, blinds your eyes.
I am the Voice of the Emperor. And there is a reason for all we do. In the end, what you think does not matter.
So, believe what you will. But your handlers have you in over your head, sticking your wet nose in Darth business.
I've gotten under your skin, haven't I?
You're nervous.
Your lack of sight is almost laughable.
Soon I'll be sticking my lightsaber in a Darth.
I'm going to kill you.
Your anger has blinded you.
You've convinced me. I will steer clear of this conflict.
[Lie] Of course.
I will judge you by your actions, not your words.
Walk away now, and perhaps our previous animosities can be swept aside.
He's the one who needs to seek forgiveness.
Look all he likes, he won't find any.
I'll never forgive him.
Don't let him get to you, Vette.
Take it easy.
The nerve. He's gonna forgive you?
He can do what he wants. I'll never let go of my anger.
Forgiveness is impossible.
It's just Baras being Baras. No reason to get upset.
Take it easy.
The man has lost his mind.
He's deluded.
No more talk. Baras's assassins must be stopped.
Scans reveal that one is a droid. But the power signature is unlike any we've seen. Another appears to be a rogue bounty hunter.
The last flies under Imperial transponder codes, so he is probably an S.I.S. agent. Which will you confront first?
Humans are more likely to be inefficient. The droid will probably arrive first.
The droid.
Imperial agents and droids are more predictable. Hunters are wild cards. I'll start with him.
The bounty hunter.
Droids and bounty hunters are common. The S.I.S. agent is the greatest threat.
The agent.
